Container.Name: plex-releases-summary
Container.Overview: A lightweight Docker container that fetches and displays recently added media items from your Plex server via Tautulli. Perfect for scheduled reports of new content added to your media library. Supports scheduled execution with CRON-like timing or one-shot mode for external cron jobs.
Container.Requires: Requires Tautulli to be installed and accessible. Make sure to set the correct Docker network to communicate with Tautulli.

Config.Name: Tautulli URL
Config.Description: URL to your Tautulli instance. Use container name if on same network, or IP address.

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: Tautulli API key (found in Tautulli Settings > Web Interface > API)

Config.Name: Days Back
Config.Description: Number of days to look back for recently added items

Config.Name: CRON Schedule
Config.Description: CRON schedule for automatic execution (e.g., '0 9 * * MON' for every Monday at 9 AM). Leave empty or unset for one-shot mode.

Config.Name: Run Once
Config.Description: Set to 'true' for one-shot execution (runs once and exits). Leave empty for scheduled mode.

Config.Name: Initial Batch Size
Config.Description: Override the default batch size for fetching items from Tautulli. By default: 100 (1-7 days), 200 (8-30 days), 500 (31+ days). Leave empty for automatic sizing.

Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: Discord webhook URL to send release summaries. To get a webhook: Discord Server Settings > Integrations > Webhooks > New Webhook. Leave empty to disable Discord notifications.

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: URL to your Plex server for Discord links. Default (https://app.plex.tv) works for most users. Only change if you need custom local links (e.g., http://plex:32400).
